content.question: Which of the following best represents the description of an independent variable in this study?

choices.label: The number of people at the location when the confederate fell
The level of experience of the scooter rider
The location on the campus where the confederate fell
The students on campus who watched the confederate fall off the scooter

content.answer: The number of people at the location when the confederate fell

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
